00020 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_THREAD_H
00021 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_THREAD_H
00022 
00023 #include <nucleus/timer.h>
00024 
00025 /* Status flags */
00026 #define XNSUSP    0x00000001    /* Suspended */
00027 #define XNPEND    0x00000002    /* Sleep-wait for a resource */
00028 #define XNDELAY   0x00000004    /* Delayed */
00029 #define XNREADY   0x00000008    /* Linked to the ready queue */
00030 #define XNDORMANT 0x00000010    /* Not started yet or killed */
00031 #define XNZOMBIE  0x00000020    /* Zombie thread in deletion process */
00032 #define XNRESTART 0x00000040    /* Restarting thread */
00033 #define XNSTARTED 0x00000080    /* Could be restarted */
00034 #define XNRELAX   0x00000100    /* Relaxed shadow thread (blocking bit) */
00035 #define XNHELD    0x00000200    /* Held thread from suspended partition */
00036 
00037 #define XNTIMEO   0x00000400    /* Woken up due to a timeout condition */
00038 #define XNRMID    0x00000800    /* Pending on a removed resource */
00039 #define XNBREAK   0x00001000    /* Forcibly awaken from a wait state */
00040 #define XNKICKED  0x00002000    /* Kicked upon Linux signal (shadow only) */
00041 #define XNBOOST   0x00004000    /* Undergoes regular PIP boost */
00042 #define XNDEBUG   0x00008000    /* Hit debugger breakpoint (shadow only) */
00043 
00044 /* Mode flags. */
00045 #define XNLOCK    0x00010000    /* Not preemptible */
00046 #define XNRRB     0x00020000    /* Undergoes a round-robin scheduling */
00047 #define XNASDI    0x00040000    /* ASR are disabled */
00048 #define XNSHIELD  0x00080000    /* IRQ shield is enabled (shadow only) */
00049 #define XNTRAPSW  0x00100000    /* Trap execution mode switches */
00050 #define XNRPIOFF  0x00200000    /* Stop priority coupling (shadow only) */
00051 
00052 #define XNFPU     0x00400000    /* Thread uses FPU */
00053 #define XNSHADOW  0x00800000    /* Shadow thread */
00054 #define XNROOT    0x01000000    /* Root thread (i.e. Linux/IDLE) */
00055 #define XNINVPS   0x02000000    /* Using inverted priority scale */
00056 
00057 /*
00058   Must follow the declaration order of the above bits. Status symbols
00059   are defined as follows:
00060   'S' -> Forcibly suspended.
00061   'w'/'W' -> Waiting for a resource, with or without timeout.
00062   'D' -> Delayed (without any other wait condition).
00063   'R' -> Runnable.
00064   'U' -> Unstarted or dormant.
00065   'X' -> Relaxed shadow.
00066   'H' -> Held thread.
00067   'b' -> Priority boost undergoing.
00068   'T' -> Ptraced and stopped.
00069   'l' -> Locks scheduler.
00070   'r' -> Undergoes round-robin .
00071   's' -> Interrupt shield enabled.
00072   't' -> Mode switches trapped.
00073   'o' -> Priority coupling off.
00074   'f' -> FPU enabled (for kernel threads).
00075 */
00076 #define XNTHREAD_SLABEL_INIT { \
00077   'S', 'W', 'D', 'R', 'U', \
00078   '.', '.', '.', 'X', 'H', \
00079   '.', '.', '.', '.', 'b', 'T', \
00080   'l', 'r', '.', 's', 't', 'o', \
00081   'f', '.', '.', '.'            \
00082 }
00083 
00084 #define XNTHREAD_BLOCK_BITS   (XNSUSP|XNPEND|XNDELAY|XNDORMANT|XNRELAX|XNHELD)
00085 #define XNTHREAD_MODE_BITS    (XNLOCK|XNRRB|XNASDI|XNSHIELD|XNTRAPSW|XNRPIOFF)
00086 
00087 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00088 #define XNTHREAD_SPARE0  0x10000000
00089 #define XNTHREAD_SPARE1  0x20000000
00090 #define XNTHREAD_SPARE2  0x40000000
00091 #define XNTHREAD_SPARE3  0x80000000
00092 #define XNTHREAD_SPARES  0xf0000000
00093 
00094 #if defined(__KERNEL__) || defined(__XENO_UVM__) || defined(__XENO_SIM__)
00095 
00096 #ifdef __XENO_SIM__
00097 /* Pseudo-status (must not conflict with other bits) */
00098 #define XNRUNNING  XNTHREAD_SPARE0
00099 #define XNDELETED  XNTHREAD_SPARE1
00100 #endif /* __XENO_SIM__ */
00101 
00102 #define XNTHREAD_INVALID_ASR  ((void (*)(xnsigmask_t))0)
00103 
00104 struct xnsched;
00105 struct xnsynch;
00106 
00107 typedef void (*xnasr_t)(xnsigmask_t sigs);
00108 
00109 typedef struct xnthread {
00110 
00111     xnarchtcb_t tcb;            /* Architecture-dependent block -- Must be first */
00112 
00113     xnflags_t status;           /* Thread status flags */
00114 
00115     struct xnsched *sched;      /* Thread scheduler */
00116 
00117     xnarch_cpumask_t affinity;  /* Processor affinity. */
00118 
00119     int bprio;                  /* Base priority (before PIP boost) */
00120 
00121     int cprio;                  /* Current priority */
00122 
00123     xnpholder_t rlink;          /* Thread holder in ready queue */
00124 
00125     xnpholder_t plink;          /* Thread holder in synchronization queue(s) */
00126 
00127     xnholder_t glink;           /* Thread holder in global queue */
00128 
00129 /* We don't want side-effects on laddr here! */
00130 #define link2thread(laddr,link) \
00131 ((xnthread_t *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((xnthread_t *)0)->link)))
00132 
00133     xnpqueue_t claimq;          /* Owned resources claimed by others (PIP) */
00134 
00135     struct xnsynch *wchan;      /* Resource the thread pends on */
00136 
00137     xntimer_t rtimer;           /* Resource timer */
00138 
00139     xntimer_t ptimer;           /* Periodic timer */
00140 
00141     xnticks_t pexpect;          /* Date of next periodic release point (raw ticks). */
00142 
00143     xnsigmask_t signals;        /* Pending core signals */
00144 
00145     xnticks_t rrperiod;         /* Allotted round-robin period (ticks) */
00146 
00147     xnticks_t rrcredit;         /* Remaining round-robin time credit (ticks) */
00148 
00149 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_STATS
00150     struct {
00151         unsigned long ssw;      /* Primary -> secondary mode switch count */
00152         unsigned long csw;      /* Context switches (includes
00153                                    secondary -> primary switches) */
00154         unsigned long pf;       /* Number of page faults */
00155        xnticks_t exec_time;    /* Accumulated execution time (tsc) */
00156        xnticks_t exec_start;   /* Start of execution time accumulation (tsc) */
00157     } stat;
00158 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_STATS */
00159 
00160     int errcode;                /* Local errno */
00161 
00162     xnasr_t asr;                /* Asynchronous service routine */
00163 
00164     xnflags_t asrmode;          /* Thread's mode for ASR */
00165 
00166     int asrimask;               /* Thread's interrupt mask for ASR */
00167 
00168     unsigned asrlevel;          /* ASR execution level (ASRs are reentrant) */
00169 
00170     int imask;                  /* Initial interrupt mask */
00171 
00172     int imode;                  /* Initial mode */
00173 
00174     int iprio;                  /* Initial priority */
00175 
00176 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_REGISTRY
00177     struct {
00178         xnhandle_t handle;      /* Handle in registry */
00179         const char *waitkey;    /* Pended key */
00180     } registry;
00181 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_REGISTRY */
00182 
00183     unsigned magic;             /* Skin magic. */
00184 
00185     char name[XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN]; /* Symbolic name of thread */
00186 
00187     xnticks_t stime;            /* Start time */
00188 
00189     void (*entry)(void *cookie); /* Thread entry routine */
00190 
00191     void *cookie;               /* Cookie to pass to the entry routine */
00192 
00193     XNARCH_DECL_DISPLAY_CONTEXT();
00194 
00195 } xnthread_t;
00196 
00197 #define XNHOOK_THREAD_START  1
00198 #define XNHOOK_THREAD_SWITCH 2
00199 #define XNHOOK_THREAD_DELETE 3
00200 
00201 typedef struct xnhook {
00202 
00203     xnholder_t link;
00204 
00205 #define link2hook(laddr) \
00206 ((xnhook_t *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((xnhook_t *)0)->link)))
00207 
00208     void (*routine)(xnthread_t *thread);
00209 
00210 } xnhook_t;
00211 
00212 #define xnthread_name(thread)              ((thread)->name)
00213 #define xnthread_clear_name(thread)        do { *(thread)->name = 0; } while(0)
00214 #define xnthread_sched(thread)             ((thread)->sched)
00215 #define xnthread_start_time(thread)        ((thread)->stime)
00216 #define xnthread_status_flags(thread)      ((thread)->status)
00217 #define xnthread_test_flags(thread,flags)  testbits((thread)->status,flags)
00218 #define xnthread_set_flags(thread,flags)   __setbits((thread)->status,flags)
00219 #define xnthread_clear_flags(thread,flags) __clrbits((thread)->status,flags)
00220 #define xnthread_initial_priority(thread)  ((thread)->iprio)
00221 #define xnthread_base_priority(thread)     ((thread)->bprio)
00222 #define xnthread_current_priority(thread)  ((thread)->cprio)
00223 #define xnthread_time_slice(thread)        ((thread)->rrperiod)
00224 #define xnthread_time_credit(thread)       ((thread)->rrcredit)
00225 #define xnthread_archtcb(thread)           (&((thread)->tcb))
00226 #define xnthread_asr_level(thread)         ((thread)->asrlevel)
00227 #define xnthread_pending_signals(thread)   ((thread)->signals)
00228 #define xnthread_timeout(thread)           xntimer_get_timeout(&(thread)->rtimer)
00229 #define xnthread_stack_size(thread)        xnarch_stack_size(xnthread_archtcb(thread))
00230 #define xnthread_handle(thread)            ((thread)->registry.handle)
00231 #define xnthread_set_magic(thread,m)       do { (thread)->magic = (m); } while(0)
00232 #define xnthread_get_magic(thread)         ((thread)->magic)
00233 #define xnthread_signaled_p(thread)        ((thread)->signals != 0)
00234 #define xnthread_user_task(thread)         xnarch_user_task(xnthread_archtcb(thread))
00235 #define xnthread_user_pid(thread) \
00236     (testbits((thread)->status,XNROOT) || !xnthread_user_task(thread) ? \
00237     0 : xnarch_user_pid(xnthread_archtcb(thread)))
00238 
00239 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_STATS
00240 #define xnthread_inc_ssw(thread)     ++(thread)->stat.ssw
00241 #define xnthread_inc_csw(thread)     ++(thread)->stat.csw
00242 #define xnthread_inc_pf(thread)      ++(thread)->stat.pf
00243 #else /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_STATS */
00244 #define xnthread_inc_ssw(thread)     do { } while(0)
00245 #define xnthread_inc_csw(thread)     do { } while(0)
00246 #define xnthread_inc_pf(thread)      do { } while(0)
00247 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_STATS */

00254                   const char *name,
00255                   int prio,
00256                   xnflags_t flags,
00257                   unsigned stacksize);

00259 void xnthread_cleanup_tcb(xnthread_t *thread);

00261 char *xnthread_symbolic_status(xnflags_t status, char *buf, int size);

00263 int *xnthread_get_errno_location(void);
00264 
00265 static inline xnticks_t xnthread_get_timeout(xnthread_t *thread, xnticks_t now)
00266 {
00267     xnticks_t timeout;
00268 
00269     if (!testbits(thread->status,XNDELAY))
00270         return 0LL;
00271 
00272     timeout = (xntimer_get_date(&thread->rtimer) ? : xntimer_get_date(&thread->ptimer));
00273 
00274     if (timeout <= now)
00275         return 1;
00276 
00277     return timeout - now;
00278 }
00279 
00280 #ifdef __cplusplus
00281 }
00282 #endif
00283 
00284 #endif /* __KERNEL__ || __XENO_UVM__ || __XENO_SIM__ */
